SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM rnum FROM ( SELECT SRS_CD, SRS_NM, ISUSE, DECODE(ISUSE, 'Y', '활성', 'N', '비활성') ISUSENM , REG_DT, REG_ID, UPD_DT, UPD_ID , (SELECT LISTAGG(B.NAME,', ') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY ORDR) AS SRS_CD FROM TB_CATEGORY_INFO B, TB_CATEGORY_SERIES C WHERE B.CODE = C.CAT_CD AND C.SRS_CD = A.SRS_CD ) AS CAT_NM FROM TB_SERIES_INFO A WHERE 1 = 1
AND SRS_CD like '%'||#{SEARCHTEXT}||'%'
AND SRS_NM like '%'||#{SEARCHTEXT}||'%'
AND ( SRS_CD like '%'||#{SEARCHTEXT}||'%' OR SRS_NM like '%'||#{SEARCHTEXT}||'%' )
ORDER BY ORDR ASC ) A WHERE rownum <= #{endNo} ) WHERE rnum > #{startNo}

SELECT COUNT(SRS_CD) FROM TB_SERIES_INFO WHERE 1 = 1
AND SRS_CD like '%'||#{SEARCHTEXT}||'%'
AND SRS_NM like '%'||#{SEARCHTEXT}||'%'
AND ( SRS_CD like '%'||#{SEARCHTEXT}||'%' OR SRS_NM like '%'||#{SEARCHTEXT}||'%' )

SELECT CODE, NAME, ISUSE, DECODE(ISUSE, 'Y', '활성', 'N', '비활성') ISUSENM , USE_ON, USE_OFF, REG_DT, REG_ID, UPD_DT, UPD_ID , P_CODE , (SELECT NAME FROM TB_CATEGORY_INFO B WHERE B.CODE = A.P_CODE) AS P_NAME , ORDR, CODE_VAL FROM TB_CATEGORY_INFO A WHERE CODE = #{CODE}

SELECT COUNT(CODE) FROM CODE WHERE 1 = 1
AND CODE = #{SEARCHCODE}
